headline: L3Harris Expands New VAMPIRE System Variants to Boost Capabilities
summary: LHX expands its VAMPIRE system lineup across land, sea, air and electronic warfare to strengthen counter-drone defense capabilities.

headline: Lockheed Boosts Shareholder Value With Buyback & 5% Dividend Hike
summary: LMT lifts its quarterly dividend by 5% and increases its share repurchase fund, reinforcing its long-running shareholder reward strategy.
